channel.title: Contacted by JaGeX? Help? aah
channel.description:
I just got this email from JaGeX, what should i do?
Anyone had experience with these matters before?

item.title: Contacted by JaGeX? Help? aah
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

In php, the mail() function accepts headers where you can set who you want the message to be from. It only takes one word change to be someone else.

mail('sendto@mail.com', 'Subject', 'Message', 'From: copyright@jagex.com');

Read full topic

item.title: Contacted by JaGeX? Help? aah
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

… Half of you are idiot’s, JaGeX will not email you, it is easy to fake a email.

First on your website you can make a email to send to inactive user’s, or banned member’s, etc… Well you can make the returning address what ever you want it to be… such as administrator@jagex.com … not hard now is it? If you got Vbulletin, ipb, i think even smf does it also.

So stop trying to drag attention to yourself.
Want proof? Pm someone who own’s a vbulletin forums and ask them to check it…

Proof on SMF:

fmquyv.png741×530

the email after it’s sent (look at the return address)

fkcf3o.png793×349

Read full topic

item.title: Contacted by JaGeX? Help? aah
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:49, topic:300348”][quote]
To whom it may concern;

I represent Jagex Limited, developer and publisher of massively multiplayer online games, including RuneScape.

A website which is hosted using your services has recently come to our attention. We believe that this website breaches your acceptable use policy and in doing so negatively impacts our game

:unscape-online.com

Jagex Limited (UK registered company number 03982706) is the exclusive owner of the copyrights in and to the RuneScape massively multiplayer online game, the associated www.runescape.com website and the text, artwork, logos and other material appearing therein, except where otherwise stated.

The website undertakes or facilitates information regarding the playing of an unauthorised version of our game.

Such behaviour damages our game, and infringes our intellectual property and other legal rights.

I would be very grateful if someone could look at this webpage with a view to having it removed.

Thank you for your time, and I look forward to your response.

Sincerely,
Bogdan Stakins
Liaison, Copyright & Intellectual Property
www.jagex.com | www.runescape.com[/quote]
It’s real, my favorite RSPS posted that notice on its site.[/quote]
The grammar is wrong; thus, it isn’t legit.

Read full topic

Thank you for your time, and I look forward to your response.

item.title: Contacted by JaGeX? Help? aah
item.dc:creator: @Ayk_Ayama Ayk Ayama
item.description:
@Ayk_Ayama wrote:

I used to own a forum, starlight.com. This has now been taken over but this used to be for private server use. I was contacted by RuneScape because a 1/150,000 members of the forum posted the RuneScape logo. The letter went on about how he will introduce his lawyer if the logo is not removed. I read this letter 8 days after it had been sent and I was given 7 days to get back to him. I then recieved another message 14 days after the situation had occured telling me that the forum was going to be removed and I will still have to pay the 3 year domain fee, when that comes. I payed the fee and haven’t recieved a message from RuneScape since.

[quote=“zoltanman, post:46, topic:300348”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=396633.msg2948228#msg2948228 date=1252341021]
Sue Jagex.
[/quote]

No sue Andrew Gower.[/quote]

Haha, he used to be called Greenjer on Devious Minds (now that was a classical game).

Read full topic
